displayName: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
rationale: This feature can be used to remotely access and exploit vulnerabilities on remote SQL Server instances and to run unsafe Visual Basic for Application functions.
error_message: Server Configuration allows for 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries'
ruleNames: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
